Key Match Events: Grant McCray hit a two-run homer in the seventh inning
Thairo Estrada's leadoff drive in the fifth was caught by Blake Perkins over the center-field wall
Jackson Chourio hit a 449-foot homer, the longest by any Brewer this season
Willy Adames hit a 435-foot homer in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Bob Melvin praised the Giants' bullpen and pitching staff
Grant McCray expressed satisfaction in winning one-run games
Blake Perkins mentioned the catch was cool but wished it meant more in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ryan Walker earned his fourth save in eight opportunities
Logan Webb hadn't allowed a homer in his last 43 1/3 innings before the game
